humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is 2.7 x 1.4 x 2.8 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 2.7 x 1.4 x 2.8 cm. In T stage for breast cancer, the largest dimension of the tumor is considered. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2, as the largest dimension (2.8 cm) is greater than 2.0 cm but not more than 5.0 cm.
